website_summaries.verdict: Don't discount this product if you have mild to moderate issues to treat, but you may want to consider another brand for major problems.
pros: Made with 2% Miconazole Nitrate in a formula that controls itching and discomfort while treating a variety of fungal skin issues, such as jock itch and athletes' foot
cons: Its effectiveness on tough-to-treat fungal infections is questionable

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective Antifungal
customer_reviews.text: We found this be be more effective than ketoconazole or clotrimazole for our son's ringworm / tinea cruris.
customer_reviews.author: Kenninghouse

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have to say much. You can tell by the pics how efective this is. The first 2 pics are before using the product and the last picture is 2 weeks after. Using it only once a day (night time). I have to say that I also use tea tree oil foot and body wash before applying Miconazole, also use a callus remover tool to remove all the dead skin. Super happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Ringworm going, going, gone
customer_reviews.text: My SO had ringworm and we had tried several different other remedies for various weeks, including one prescribed by the Dr. None of them worked on his ringworm, however, based on other product reviews here we decided to try this and it worked perfectly. We saw improvement within 3 days, and it was finally gone within a few weeks. So glad we purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: Hopebringer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing - healed my jock itch in less than 2 days!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing - healed my jock itch in less than 2 days!!!! the package recommends using it for 2 weeks. No need really, within 2 days - my severe case of jock itch disappeared. I still used it for 2 more days to ensure complete healing. i could not believe it. I never had jock itch before, so I ordered this before going to doctor. could not believe how quickly it worked. Even used it on my feet
customer_reviews.author: Miami Girl

customer_reviews.title: Apply after shower.
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review because the product is so amazing i want to share my experience. I rely on reviews when i am buying so i hate when people writing good reviews for bad products to get discounts. Anyway i had a rash under my breast because i am 42DDD. I only use this product for a week and my skin was clear. I have the whole tube in my bathroom cabinet and nothing to do with it. I don't know if works for all skin type but it did for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kitubu

customer_reviews.title: Pediatrician Recommended as a Diaper Cream ( i know Strange) but effective!
customer_reviews.text: Our pediatrician recommended this a diaper cream. It actually has many of the same active ingredients but it much easier to spread. I mix it with regular zinc oxide diaper cream when i want to make sure i have a strong barrier between my little ones skin and any fecal matter. Works like a charm to allow a good healing environment.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Paige

customer_reviews.title: It works. Happy with the results.
customer_reviews.text: It has no scent which is good. I have ringworm & it spread from my hand to my breast & eyebrows. It itched like crazy. I was using other anti-fungal creams but they weren't doing anything but helping it spread. Decided to get this before making a doctors appointment & I'm glad I did. It immediately stopped the itching & the ringworm is starting to heal. The spores have crusted over which means it's healing. All the read bumps have gone down in inflammation as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: This helped so much in getting rid of a ring worm I had... I never had ring worm before and don’t have luxury of going to doctor and even then I read most doctors don’t do much. I tried everything before this: apple cider vinegar, bleach(scary yes, I was desperate),antibacterial soap)which I strongly recommend even with this cream), tea tree oil. The best thing that I saw improvement with was this cream.
customer_reviews.author: marily gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what they put in this stuff but it works!! I’ve been having problems with blisters and what I thought was eczema on and around my feet for years!! Since I’ve been using this product it helped with the itching and healed it! I haven’t had a break out since!! I’m amazed! I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MsTrio

customer_reviews.title: cats could get fungal infections
customer_reviews.text: the vet told me to use this on my cat's neck. he had been scratching and losing fur. this made it go away in about a week. you have to trap them in the bathroom and shave their necks first. i didnt know that cats could get fungal infections on their skin.
customer_reviews.author: marypatric

customer_reviews.title: It’s not working :(
customer_reviews.text: I used to had this same composition (Miconazole Nitrate 2%) in another product that I bought in Brazil, and always worked. But unfortunately this one is not helping me at all. This is the third week that I’ve been using it without any progress.
customer_reviews.author: Thais

customer_reviews.title: Make symptom worse
customer_reviews.text: I was almost recovered using another brand of Miconazole Nitrate, but my old cream ran out(and not available immediately), so I bought this one and use it for 3 days. It makes the fungal grows much faster! That yesterday I almost prefer going to find a knife :-( My doctor just now asked me to throw it away and suggest another cream.
customer_reviews.author: Y. L.

customer_reviews.title: great product works
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff I wear rubber working gloves for work..more then a few times I have gotten fungus on my hands athletes foot on the hands starts to crack and hurt just like athletes foot.. This clears it up in a few days
customer_reviews.author: dresden67

customer_reviews.title: Worked!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works!! I had jock itch really bad. It was so unbearable. I bought other creams and sprays but they didn't work and some would sting to the point of not wanting to use it anymore. I searched online to see what would help jock itch and I found that this in the ingredient in prescription medicine. So, I ordered it. A few days after using it I wasn't itching anymore and my rash was starting to clear up.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Fast cure for jock itch
customer_reviews.text: I tried everything the get rid of my jock itch. Saw a video of this stuff and gave it a try. It worked awesome and fast. Wish I had tried it sooner
customer_reviews.author: churchfixer

customer_reviews.title: Puts a stop to athlete's foot once and for all!
customer_reviews.text: I battled athlete's foot for almost a year. My doctor prescribed a cream that was $140 for 3 oz. I couldn't afford to get it. I tried this cream and my athletes foot was cured, completely cured, within one week and that was several years ago now. It has not come back at all. This will always be something I keep in my cabinet. This is incredible and such a lifesaver when you're really suffering from athlete's foot.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Rotthoff

customer_reviews.title: Fixed my ringworm quickly
customer_reviews.text: This is the only cream that kills my ringworm. I tried the usual drug store creams and it only went away with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Octorafest

customer_reviews.title: Works fast!
customer_reviews.text: Had foot fungus and ringworm. Applied for a week and it all cleared up. Will continue to use u til tube is gone but this is very powerful and very effective. I was using clotrimazole. But it did not work as fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I had terrible fungal rash on both of my feet, I tried a lot of methods and decided to get this as the last resort before going to my doctor. It only took a week and the rash was gone.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Did the job and also
customer_reviews.text: I like that it didn’t irritate my skin even more or that it didn’t sting or burn, the odor wasn’t that overwhelming either and I like that , will buy again

customer_reviews.title: Works great!

customer_reviews.title: If you are using this until you can see a doctor that is what I did and it helped better than anything else
customer_reviews.text: Did what it was meant to do but had to go to the doctor to ultimately fix my jock itch since it was acute. If you are using this until you can see a doctor that is what I did and it helped better than anything else

customer_reviews.text: Thank you for the speedy delivery the product was in good condition. I do like the result after using and I will order more.

customer_reviews.title: healing quality
customer_reviews.text: I had a bladder infection that caused my urine to irritate me. I used this and healed it up and kept it good while I was getting over the infection. This is a good buy as well.

customer_reviews.text: This worked to remove a fungal infection of ringworm but it took a LOT of the tube to do it. Depending on the severity of your infection, you may need more than one tube.

Tried a couple of ointments that didn't work. I've been using this for about less than a week now and that itchiness is starting to go away. Hoping it will heal completely soon!

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: My son had ringworm and I didn't know how else to get rid of it. The ringworm wasn't out of control, just a couple spots on his legs. 3 applications of this stuff and the ringworm is gone. It worked so well I decided to try it on my stinky feed. Who knew I had athletes foot? Once again, less than a week later the redness on the soles of my feet is gone (it did make the skin on the soles of my feet crack some). This is a good product and one that I will keep on hand for future fungal infections.

customer_reviews.title: Helped Somewhat But Did Not Cure The Problem.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for jock itch. Used product for over a month without solving the problem. It would stop the itch and sooth for awhile but just never cured the problem. Finally had to get a prescription from my doctor to stop the itch and cure completely. I gave this a fair test along with 3 other over the counter remedies that also didn't work before finally going to my doctor. This may work on some forms of jock itch, but it didn't work for me. For the cost of a doctors visit and medication, I would certainly give this a try first, but in the end you may need something stronger to cure the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Dreyfous

customer_reviews.title: ... treating my breast thrush- relieved the itching and discomfort pretty quickly (within a day) and was easy to use ...
customer_reviews.text: This was helpful in treating my breast thrush- relieved the itching and discomfort pretty quickly (within a day) and was easy to use as I continued breastfeeding. I used a q-tip to apply as to keep the area clean, and it absorbed prior to the next nursing session. I did just wipe with a wet paper towel before nursing just to be sure nothing was left.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Works great on ringworm. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I had a spot of ringworm on my hand. I was very good about applying clotrimazole on it, but after a month and a half or so, I had 5 growing spots of ringworm, and it didn't appear that the clotrimazole was doing any good. I first started using Miconazole 9 days ago. I use it more than recommended as I reapply after washing my hands. THIS STUFF WORKS! I'm happy to report that the spread has stopped, and all of the outbreak spots are looking so much better. I can still make out the bumps and can feel the rough patches, but it is a world of difference compared to before.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Helped with ringworm
customer_reviews.text: Helped with my husbands ringworm he had on his chest, We first washed the areas with apple cider vinegar(kinda let it sit & soak using cotton rounds). Then after we dried the area he applied this cream. It worked very well, I believe the apple cider vinegar helped with this as well. Did not notice a scent. Would by again

customer_reviews.text: Used this for ringworm, in about two weeks it cleared up! This stuff is a life saver. Still have plenty left over.

product_meta.title: Miconazole Nitrate 2% Antifungal Cream - 1 Oz Tube
product_meta.description: Package Quantity:1Miconazole Nitrate 2 % Antifungal foot Cream proven clinically effective in the treatment of athlete's foot (tinea pedis), jock itch (tinea cruris), and ringworm (tinea corporis). For effective relief of itching, scaling, burning and discomfort that can accompany these conditions.
feature_bullets: Most EFFECTIVE Miconazole Nitrate 2% on the market
